body.name: All-new Amazon Fire HD 10 Kids Pro tablet- 2023, ages 6-12 | Bright 10.1" HD screen | Slim case for older kids, ad-free content, parental controls, 13-hr battery, 32 GB, Nebula
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 7 hrs 2 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Recycled Content Certification for Electrical and Electronic Equipment products have at least 10-50% recycled content, based on product type and environmental impact.

features: SAVE UP TO $70 — A fully featured tablet (not a toy) with a wide, 10.1" 1080p Full HD display for kids ages 6-12 includes comprehensive parental controls, 1 year of Amazon Kids+, a kid-proof case, and a 2-year worry-free guarantee.

ROBUST PARENTAL CONTROLS — Manage everything from your phone, including screen-time limits, pausing or resuming the device, accessing educational content, and approving requests from the app store, like downloading Netflix, Disney+, and Zoom.

ENTERTAINMENT KIDS LOVE –— Includes a 1-year subscription to award winning Amazon Kids+, which features thousands of ad-free books, games, videos, apps, from brands like Disney, Marvel, and LEGO. After 1 year, your subscription will automatically renew every month starting at just $4.99/month plus applicable tax. You may cancel any time by visiting the Amazon Parent Dashboard or contacting Customer Service.
SAFETY FIRST — We partner with leading family trust experts to provide a safer digital experience for kids.

POWERFUL AND BRIGHT — The large 10.1" 1080p Full HD display shows off all their favorite things, and everything runs seamlessly thanks to 3 GB RAM and 25% faster performance than the previous generation.
MORE TIME TO EXPLORE — 13 hours of battery life keeps up with them all day without multiple breaks to recharge.

DESIGNED FOR BIG KIDS — A filtered web browser, video and voice calling, a protective case, and a sleek display match their cool factor. Parents can set screen time limits, educational goals, and approve requests from the app store.
2-YEAR WORRY-FREE GUARANTEE INCLUDED — If it breaks, return it and we’ll replace it for free.
ROOM TO GROW — 32 GB of storage and up to 1 TB of expandable storage (sold separately) leave space for all their books, movies, games, and more.

productInformation.name: Display
productInformation.value: Brilliant 10.1” 1080p display (1920 x 1200) with over 2 million pixels (224 ppi), for bright, vivid image quality. Screen strengthened with aluminosilicate glass.

productInformation.name: Size
productInformation.value: Kid-Friendly Case: 7.5 " x 10.1” x 0.7” (189.3mm x 256mm x 16.3mm).

productInformation.name: Weight
productInformation.value: 23.21 oz (658.1g) Actual size and weight may vary by configuration and manufacturing process.

productInformation.name: CPU & RAM
productInformation.value: Octa-core processor - 2x Arm Cortex-A76 up to 2.05 Ghz and 6x Arm Cortex A55 up to 2 Ghz with 3 GB RAM.

productInformation.name: Storage
productInformation.value: 32 GB (24.0 GB available to user) of internal storage. Add microSD card for up to 1 TB of additional storage. Some apps may require that they are installed on internal storage. App or feature updates may impact available storage.

productInformation.name: Battery Life
productInformation.value: Up to 13 hours of reading, browsing the web, watching video, and listening to music. Battery life will vary based on device settings, usage, and other factors such as web browsing and downloading content. Certain software features or apps may reduce battery life.

productInformation.name: Charge time
productInformation.value: Fully charge in under 4 hours with USB-C cable and 9W power adapter included in the box. Fully charge in under 3 hours with 15W adapter and USB type C to C cable (adapter and cable sold separately).

productInformation.name: Wifi connectivity
productInformation.value: Dual-band wifi. Supports public and private wifi networks or hotspots that use the dual-band 802.11a/b/g/n/ac standards with support for security standard of WEP, WPA3 OWE, WPA/WPA2/WPA3 Personal and WPA/WPA2/WPA3 Enterprise. Wi-Fi 6 (802.11 ax) is currently not supported.

productInformation.name: Ports
productInformation.value: USB-C (2.0) connector for charging; microSD slot for external storage.

productInformation.name: Audio
productInformation.value: 3.5 mm stereo jack and dual integrated speakers; external volume controls.

productInformation.name: Sensors
productInformation.value: Accelerometer, ambient light sensor.

productInformation.name: Camera specs
productInformation.value: 5 MP front-facing and rear-facing cameras with 1080p video recording.

productInformation.name: Location services
productInformation.value: Location-based services via wifi.

productInformation.name: Available colors
productInformation.value: Nebula, Happy Day, Mint.

productInformation.name: Bluetooth
productInformation.value: Built-in Bluetooth 5.3 with support for A2DP compatible stereo headphones, speakers, microphone, and LE accessories support.

productInformation.name: Accessiblity features
productInformation.value: • VoiceView screen reader enables access to the vast majority of Fire tablet features for users who are blind or visually impaired using text-to-speech or a connected refreshable braille display. • Screen magnifier enables viewers to zoom in and out, and pan around the screen. • Fire tablets also include accessibility settings for Closed Captioning, Font Size, High Contrast Text, Color Inversion, Color Correction, and Convert Stereo to Mono audio.(Captions and ability to modify font size are not available for all content and experiences). Learn more about these accessibility features..

productInformation.name: Warranty and service
productInformation.value: 2-year worry-free guarantee. See more details about this coverage. Use of Fire HD 10 Kids tablet is subject to Amazon's Conditions of Use and these terms.

productInformation.name: Subscription
productInformation.value: Includes 1 year of Amazon Kids+ for new subscribers. Learn more about this here.

productInformation.name: Included in the box
productInformation.value: Fire HD 10 tablet, Kid-friendly Case, USB-C (2.0) cable, 9W power adapter, and Quick Start Guide.

productInformation.name: Generation
productInformation.value: 13th generation, 2023 release.

productInformation.name: Age Range
productInformation.value: Ages 6+. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – Small parts. Not for children under 3 years.

productInformation.name: Software security updates
productInformation.value: This device receives guaranteed software security updates until at least four years after the device is last available for purchase as a new unit on our websites. Learn more about these software security updates. If you already own a Fire tablet, visit Manage Your Content and Devices for information specific to your device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: The size of this product is perfect. I really like the color and design of the case and appreciate that it has the fold up stand/handle that seems sturdy. It was easy to set up and I was able to find most of the apps my child already likes as well. It is fast and parental controls are simple which is a big reason why I was trying to move away from the iPad since it has basically no restrictions and no screen time controls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tablet for kids.
reviews.reviewText: This 10" Tablet has been great for my 6 year old. It is user friendly, keeps the charge & charges quickly. It is easy to get setup and can be setup to be monitored & controlled by adults easy as well.It has a lot of capabilities & features for kids. They can easily access resources like PBS kids and child appropriate games. You may find you run out of storage space quickly. We needed to get an SD card shortly after purchase of Tablet. Other than that it has been great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 8 year old bought this tablet with the money he made. He was looking for a new Kindle to play Roblox on, this fit the bill. Easy to put parental controls and to set up protection for your kid. Great size, clear picture, and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought as Christmas present for our 7 yr old to replace an outdated IPad. Love the parental control, big screen, clear picture.Connecting to hotspots and WiFi outside of your home can be a bit frustrating as it requires the parent to log in and contacted. But overall love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We had the kindle fire 8 HD for kids for a while. that one was giving us more of a hard time these days so my husband mentioned about upgrading his tablet. So we did!I looked into the trade it in policy and when we found this tablet we knew this was the next purchase. The trade in for the old one was great! we got 20% off the next purchase PLUS a $25 gift card! (which also went towards the new tablet).This is just the upgraded version of the last one. Less of a foamy case and a bigger screen. The buttons and charger and headphone jack are now all on the same side. cute cased to chose from not just solid colors. Once turned on, it looked identical to the previous one. everything was there. Yeah I had to readjust his goals and timer setting and volume settings, but its definitely worth the purchase! Prime day might have better deals on it than middle of January (last one we got was on prime day). But over all review 10/10 recommend! I can even adjust settings virtually with my phone through the amazon kids app! PERFECT!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Didn’t want to get an iPad for my kid who ended up loving this. Lots of parental controls and apps and games to keep creative juices flowing. Love Amazon kids subscription too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The warranty is fantastic.
reviews.reviewText: We love our kids fire tablets anyway but the reason we will always repurchase is the warranty. My daughter dropped her tablet perfectly wrong and the screen shattered, which has never happened in the 8 years we’ve used these products. Amazon sent us a shipping label, fixed it, and sent it back within a day or two. A tiny piece of the jack on my son’s headphones broke off IN THE PORT a while back and again, they sent the shipping label and either fixed or replaced very quickly. Electronics for little kids is a difficult feat both with safety and how rough they can be on their items but Amazon does well helping parents navigate those issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don't get me wrong it's a nice tablet very well made and the new feature upgrade is nice! But the case is super thin and those of us that have kids know they tend to drop it. I wish there was an option for a warranty. Also, I didn't think it would come before Christmas. It kept getting delayed, took too much time to ship/ deliver.
